text: ==History== It was started in 1983, as the Walt Disney Pictures Television Division, the name was later shortened to Walt Disney Pictures Television and in 1986 was later shortened to Walt Disney Television in 1988. Until 1983, Disney shows were aired under the banner of the parent company, then named Walt Disney Productions. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Walt Disney Television at Museum.tv Category:Disney companies
title: Walt Disney Television
